title: Ranked season 2016: While you wait
body: What champion do you think is in need of a rework/Adjustment the most?  I can only fit 10 so feel free to comment your opinions

replies.body: DO NOT REWORK URGOT OR YORICK

The only champs who need a rework are the ones that have already been reworked or been too messed up by Riot. Many champs receive reworks for no points -> Ashe. Ashe's rework has actually been a huge nerf if you knew how to play her pre-rework. Same with poppy, gp, morde, fiora. Reworks are great for new players, but pretty shit if you actually mained the champ. All the champions on your list are fine and in the right hands are all OP. It's the player that needs the rework, not the champion. However there are many champs such as katarina that need a rework since they are get into high elo free champs. Easy to learn, Easier to master.
Met a guy who was a morde main and he showed me how good it really was before the rework. Feel sorry for him. He mained it from s1

> [{quoted}](name=Hot Cousin,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=jxwKIlAs,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-01-19T14:46:00.308+0000)
>
>  Ashe is about the same as pre-rework but more stupid burst from her Q.  I think she was fine before honestly.

Every time i picked Ashe before the rework i had people getting toxic and already calling gg. Until the game ends and they say something along the lines of that is the only person i've seen not feed on Ashe. Ashe was really good and balanced before the re-work. You're right, she was fine before. The burst was good and at the trade off of some time focusing. Then they reworked her and she was OP? at the start but good after some changes. I really got to like Ashe at that point, building no crit items on her only assassin and it worked out pretty well. But what the fuck did they just do to her now. She feels so clunky. 4 Stacks on Q. W hitbox getting soaked up by 1 minion. Less damage on W. Slow's don't do shit till past lvl 14 which if you make it to without being 0/10 means you've probably already won the game 4v5. Slows don't do shit when Quinn can instakill you, twitch can instakill you, vayne can instakill you. Pretty much any champ atm. Ashe is in a weird spot and won't find her pre-rework winrates unless something gets changed. Probably will be the first season i give Ashe the skip :( 

Similar thing is with poppy. Those who knew how to play her were gods on it, as it should be. Fiora as well before was godly if you knew how to play her. Sure she was pretty one dimensional, but that was her strength and weakness. I loved her kit before. All about game knowledge and knowing when you can and can't fight. 

Riot seems to be trying to complicate every character now. But i think for most of us, we fell in love with LoL because of the simple kits. The easy to pick up, hard to master aspect. Not too happy with Riot's game design direction, but what can you do aye. 

Idk, just little pre-season sadness kicking in. This season will be a hard climb
I'm looking forward to the Taric rework. I'm also really hoping Blitzcrank gets either reworked or deleted from the game but who knows
